name: Customer Account - Forgot Password
subject: {SITE_NAME} Password Reset
alt_body:
Dear {ACCOUNT_FIRST_NAME},

Your {SITE_NAME} account password has been reset. Your new password is {NEW_PASSWORD}.

You can now login to your account using your email address and new password.
note: from front end, customer can request password

name: Customer Account - Forgot Username
subject: Your {SITE_NAME} Account Username
alt_body:
Dear {ACCOUNT_FIRST_NAME},

Your {SITE_NAME} account username is listed below.  You can login to your account by clicking (or copy and pasting) this link:

{ACCOUNT_LOGIN_LINK}

Your username is {ACCOUNT_USER}.

Do Not Copy and Paste - Manually type userid and password into login fields.

You can now login to your account using your userid and password.
